metadata.title: CVE-2017-9988 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The readEncUInt30 function in util/read.c in libming 0.4.8 mishandlesmemory allocation. A crafted input will lead to a remote denial of service(NULL pointer dereference) attack against parser.c.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
